processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Fully processed to the item level.
This collection combines three separate accessions: V1986.006, V1986.007, and V1986.008.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Three calendars, titled Brooklyn Landmarks: A calendar for the year of 1902, with pen drawings by F. A. Busing, of Brooklyn's oldest landmarks--the disappearing homesteads of the 17th and 18th centuries, copyright 1901. Each calendar contains 15 pages with 20 views of Dutch homesteads in Brooklyn, identified by owner name, neighborhood, street, date or time period built, and historic facts about the site. Brooklyn neighborhoods depicted in the collection include Flatlands, East New York, Flatbush, Bergen Beach, Bay Ridge, Canarsie, New Lots, Gravesend, and Coney Island.
